page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE I
page.content:
Therese Allen She gets up at 7:30 to iron a blouse to wear to work. Then she makes herself some toast and coffee, usually burning the toast. She makes me a mug of tea with milk and two sugars and makes breakfast for my sister. After eating, she showers, washes her hair and brushes her teeth. She gets dressed, puts on her make-up as her hair dries. At 8:45 she leaves for work, as personal secretary to the Chairman of Maidstone United Football Club.
She usually arrives home at about 6:30 and makes tea for my dad and herself. After that she usually watches TV for an hour and then helps dad with his work (in the studio completing video programs).
